General Terms

If you continue to browse and use this website, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which govern International ASET's relationship with you in relation to this website. Unless otherwise indicated, this website and its contents are the property of International Academy of Science, Engineering and Technology (a trade name for International ASET Inc.). The term 'International Academy of Science, Engineering and Technology' or 'International ASET' or 'us' or 'we' refers to the owner of the website. The term 'you' refers to the user or viewer of our website.

Links to Third Party Sites

The links to other websites will let you leave this website. The linked websites are not under the control of International ASET Inc. and we are not responsible for the contents of any linked website. International ASET Inc. is providing these links to you only as a convenience, and the insertion of any link does not imply approval of the site. It is up to you to ensure that whatever you select for your use is free of such items as viruses, bugs, problems or other limitations.

Submission of your Information

All information submitted to International ASET Inc. by you via the website shall be the property of International ASET Inc. We shall be free to use such information for any lawful purpose. We shall not have any responsibility to keep any information confidential, except as otherwise specifically agreed to in writing by International ASET Inc. or as required by law. International ASET Inc. shall not be responsible for any damages that you or any third-party may suffer as a result of the broadcast of confidential information that you make to us through our website. Once you submit any information through our website, you will be responsible for the security of your login IDs and passwords for the website. You agree that any person that uses your identification issued for the website will be treated by us as having been authorized by you to access your information as contained on the website, and take any other actions on your behalf.

Questions

Please email us at info@avestia.com with any questions you have about these Terms and Conditions of Use.

Copyright Notice

The materials on this website are protected on the grounds of copyright laws. © Copyright, International ASET Inc. – All Rights Reserved.
